channel.title: Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee
channel.description: Recent content on Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee

item.title: Research
item.description: My work can also be found here. Papers and publications ‘Defocalization in Cantonese right dislocation’ (2017)[link] Gengo Kenkyu 152: 59-87. DOI: 10.11435/gengo.152.0_59 . Presentations ‘Head movement with semantic effects: Aspectual verb raising in Cantonese’ [link to handout] oral presentation at The 93rd Annual Meeting of the Linguistic Society of America, New York City, 3-6 Jan, 2019. ‘Decomposing wh-expressions in Cantonese’ oral presentation at The 11th Cross-Strait Symposium on Modern Chinese Language, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, 7-8 Dec, 2018.
